ygData.subject: Re: EQ slang
ygData.msgSnippet: ... But... but... just LOOK at that limerick down there! Look at those beautiful anapests!  That s the way to write a limerick, folks -- it s not enough to get
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] EQ slang
>Date: Mon, Jun 28, 1999, 6:23 PM
>

>From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
>Please, please, please, take this argument elsewhere. I'm not trying to be a
>control freak, and I'm not trying to take sides....I just believe (as I'm
>sure some of the rest of you do...) that this thread no longer applies to
>the tenets of this mailing list...In other words, I no longer believe this
>is bard-related material.

But... but... just LOOK at that limerick down there! Look at those beautiful
anapests! That's the way to write a limerick, folks -- it's not enough to
get the rhyme, you've got to get the rhythm as well. Didn't need the comma
after "fantasy," though...

(Fine poetic models aside, I have to agree -- please take the flames to
e-mail.)

-- Sharon, limerictrician emeritus


>From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 19:04
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] EQ slang
>
>> In Norrath a bard name of Cooter
>> Was only a bug-using looter
>> He just didn't care
>> For a fantasy, fair
>> He'd ride through and shoot from a scooter.
